directions.step:
Cut up artichokes and mushrooms and marinate overnight in combined liquids from artichokes and mushrooms. When ready to prepare, place a layer of mixture in buttered casserole alternating with bread crumbs, ending with bread crumbs topped with pats of butter. Bake in 350 degree oven for 40 minutes. Serves 4.
OVERNIGHT MARINATE
From <A Taste of Louisiana>. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
